text:
[redacted_name]: ضليت صافنه هذا شبي يباوع هيج عليه
[redacted_name]: ااءء [redacted_name] موجوده
[redacted_name]: ضحكت بداخلي على ارتباكه مني او توتره اي موجوده
[redacted_name]: من الثوله كتله صيحلياه
[redacted_name]: هههههههه ماتحملت او ضحكحت اعليه اي ادخلي علمود اصيحه الج
[redacted_name]: من الفشله ودي الگاع تنشگ او تبلعني طبعن دخلت او [redacted_name] راح او اجتني [redacted_name] تركض
[redacted_name]: لج هلاا شلونج
[redacted_name]: شلوني يعني شنو اتشوفين بضوجه
[redacted_name]: افف من [redacted_name] صح
[redacted_name]: طلع اكيد ما راح يجي
[redacted_name]: حبي معليج اني ادبر الج فرصه يالله تعاي ندخل
[redacted_name]: بضجر يلااا
[redacted_name]: طبعن بلشنه نقره كيمياء اني او [redacted_name]
[redacted_name]: هلوووو حببببب
[redacted_name]: وجع شبيج خرعتيني
[redacted_name]: وجع بگلبج ولج[redacted_name] مشتاقتلج كومه
[redacted_name]: عمري والله حتى اني مشتاقتلج هلا ايام ماتنشافين ملتهيه وياا الحب
[redacted_name]: ههههه اكيد غير ختيبي
[redacted_name]+[redacted_name]: هههههه
[redacted_name]: [redacted_name] اليوم ابقي يمنه
[redacted_name]: لا بنات اريد اروح تعبانه
[redacted_name]: ماكو ما اطلعين يمنه تبقين راح اخابر عموو يخليج يمنه
[redacted_name]: لا ساره خابري [redacted_name] يجي علمود امشي
trans:
[redacted_name]: I was just staring at him, like what's wrong with him looking at me like that?
[redacted_name]: Umm... is [redacted_name] here?
[redacted_name]: I laughed inside at how nervous and flustered he got around me. Yes, she’s here.
[redacted_name]: Out of confusion, I told him, “Call her for me.”
[redacted_name]: Hahaha, I couldn’t hold it in and laughed at him. “Yes, I’ll go inside and call her for you.”
[redacted_name]: I was so embarrassed I wished the ground would split open and swallow me. Anyway, I went in, and [redacted_name] left. Then [redacted_name] came running to me.
[redacted_name]: Hey, hi! How are you?
[redacted_name]: How am I? What do you think? You can tell I’m upset.
[redacted_name]: Ugh, because of [redacted_name], right?
[redacted_name]: He left and it’s obvious he won’t come.
[redacted_name]: Don’t worry, honey. I’ll find an opportunity for you. Come on, let’s go in.
[redacted_name]: I'm bored, let's go.
[redacted_name]: Of course, we started chatting about chemistry, me and [redacted_name].
[redacted_name]: Heeey! love!
[redacted_name]: Ouch, what’s wrong with you? You scared me!
[redacted_name]: Ouch in your heart, [redacted_name], I missed you so much!
[redacted_name]: Sweetheart, I swear to Allah I missed you too! We can not see you; you’re busy nowadays with your love.
[redacted_name]: Haha, obviously! My fiancé, of course.
[redacted_name] + [redacted_name]: Hahaha
[redacted_name]: [redacted_name], stay with me today.
[redacted_name]: No, girls. I want to go home; I’m exhausted.
[redacted_name]: No way, you’re not leaving. You’re staying here! I’ll call your dad to allow you to stay with us.
[redacted_name]: No, Sarah, call [redacted_name] to come pick me up.
